betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This is an accessory that provides additional hunger restoration when the player consumes food.

It will only grant an extra 1 point of hunger and saturation after eating, and it is not affected by the nature or type of the food. However, there is a very small chance to receive a brief "nausea" debuff after each consumption.

To unlock the research, the required junk food to eat is a cookie.
